text: Mamphela Aletta Ramphele (born 28 December 1947) is a South African politician and writer. In February 2013, she started her own political party, Agang South Africa. Ramphele was previously an activist against Apartheid in South Africa. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:South African politicians Category:South African writers Category:South African anti-apartheid activists Category:Living people
title: Mamphela Ramphele
